title: The Salesman De Asghar Farhadi Cannes

sources.title: TheSalesmanDeAsgharFarhadiCannes
sources.description: synopsis Forced out of their apartment due to dangerous works on a neighboring building, Emad and Rana move into a new flat in the center of Tehran. An incident linked to the previous tenant will dramatically change the young couple’s life. international title:  The Salesman original title:  Forushande country:  Iran, France sales agent:  Memento Films International year:  2016 genre:  fiction directed by:  Asghar Farhadi release date:  BE 08/2016 screenplay:  Asghar Farhadi cast:  Shahab Hosseini, Taraneh Alidoosti production:  ARTE France Cinéma, Memento Films distributor:  Cinéart
